citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Multiple forms of enrichment are being offered to all birds at the facility, however an environmental enhancement plan has
not been documented. A documented species specific plan is required to verify the facility is adequately promoting the
psychological well-being of birds. In addition, the plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. The facility must
document the enrichment plan for birds.
*******Correct by June 30, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n
